mapper.insert: insert into hierarchy_table (courseNo, categoryNo, skillNo) values (#{courseNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{skillNo})
insert into lecture_info (lectureTeacherNo, lectureName, lectureContent) values (#{lectureTeacherNo}, #{lectureName}, #{lectureContent})
mapper.select: select * from course_table order by courseNo;
select * from category_table order by categoryNo;
select * from skill_table order by skillNo;
select count(*) from course_table where courseNo = #{courseNo}
select count(*) from category_table where categoryNo = #{categoryNo}
select count(*) from skill_table where skillNo = #{skillNo}
select count(*) from course_table where courseName = #{courseName}
select count(*) from category_table where categoryName = #{categoryName}
select count(*) from skill_table where skillName = #{skillName}
select c.courseNo, courseName from hierarchy_table as h left join course_table as c on h.courseNo = c.courseNo group by courseNo order by 1

select a.categoryNo, categoryName from hierarchy_table as h left join category_table as a on h.categoryNo = a.categoryNo where courseNo in (select courseNo from course_table where courseName = #{courseName}) group by categoryNo order by 1
